elements.summary:
A proven management professional across multiple industries with exceptional stakeholder engagement. Led teams of up to 32 to deliver operational targets designed with strategic intent. Driven projects and managed complex partner relationships and priorities, often in pressure environments. A history of process refinement, creating efficiencies and reducing costs. Transitioned from 8 years as a British Army officer to become an operational and system design specialist. Demonstrated quick assimilation of two diverse industries and have demonstrated leadership, strong relationship management skills and a character that wins trust from superiors. I have executed and delivered two successful Polar expeditions for injured soldiers. 

I was educated at Dauntseys School, the University of Kent and the Royal Military Accademy Sandhurst. 

Whilst in the Army I have completed 3 Military Analysis modules, commanded on Operations in Afghanistan, Oman, Nigeria and Burundi and have qualified as  a UN Negotiator, Investigator and Observer. I have also led expeditions of fellow wounded soldiers to the geographic North and South Poles. I was awarded a CGSC in the 14 New Years honours list. 

I am SC cleared.

elements.summary:
As the Chief of Staff & Head of Office at a UHNW Family Office, I support a Principal in their media and angel investing endeavors. With six years of experience in this type of role, I have developed a diverse set of competencies that enable me to organize and optimize the busiest lives. I am adept at managing VVIP events, overseeing media strategy, designing and implementing technology solutions, and leading diverse teams.

My mission is to deliver on the strategic vision of my principals, while ensuring their privacy and security. I have a US Secret Security Clearance, which reflects my trustworthiness and discretion. I also have a background in international affairs, security policy, and public and political communication, which gives me an edge in navigating complex and sensitive situations. I am passionate about supporting high-performance, UHNW individuals who make a positive impact on the world.

elements.summary:
I proudly live on Treaty 7 First Nations (Indigenous) soil. 

Analytical and decisive executive providing C-level leadership with multi-national companies across industries such as oil & gas, chemicals, alternative energy, mining, regulatory and transportation with manufacturing experience in engineered OEM mechanical/electrical components (EPIC), analytical instrumentation and heavy equipment. Industrial P&L accountability exceeding $500 million with Private Equity, Family Office and First Nations experience. Significant Fintech knowledge in the emerging ISO 20022 International banking standards. MBA in Energy and Sustainability; dissertation in agriculture as it relates to energy requirements, caloric yields and GHGs. Triple Bottom Line (3P - People, Planet, Profit) experience. Client-facing consultative visionary; proven niche capability of addressing industry needs, with strategic sales & marketing initiatives, and rolling-out first to market (blue ocean strategy) leading-edge technologies. Offer an impeccable track record of identifying and capitalizing on business development opportunities with company-wide process improvements and lean operational measures for profitability. Effective team builder, Myers-briggs ENFJ leadership; known for achieving company-wide cohesion, transforming under-performing staff or assets, and driving powerful cultural change in matrix organizations. Well respected industry leader who confidently delivers technical presentations at global energy conferences. Experience with the majority of oil majors in North/South America, Asia Pacific, GCC and eastern/western Europe. Global voting member of ASTM International main committee D02, subcommittees "J"​ (jet fuels), "E"​ (diesel and alternative fuels) and "07" (flow properties of crude oils and finished products). Served as a committee Chairman with ASTM International in the development of an International Standard ASTM D7397.

elements.summary:
Antonio Rodrigues, Partner at MFO | Multi Family Office ®, former Member of the Executive Board and Group CFO of Banco Comercial Português between1995 and 2008.
Member of the Founders Advisory Board of D. Luis Foundation, Cascais, Portugal. 

He began his career at KPMG – Peat Marwick as an auditor and consultant in Madrid and London. Manager and later Senior Manager of the Lisbon office, he was responsible for Banking and Insurance.
In 1989 joined Banco Comercial Português as General Manager and became Head Planning and Research responsible for listing in NYSE and SEC reporting. In 1995 he was appointed Executive Managing Director of Banco Comercial Português and in 2000 became Deputy Chairman of Servibanca, the BCP Group Service Company. He also served as Member of the Board of ActivoBank, Seguros e Pensões Gere, and of Banco Comercial Português Foundation. In 2007 became Deputy Chairman of Millenniumbcp Fortis Grupo Segurador.  Group CFO from 1995 to 2008, in different occasions was also responsible for Privat Banking, audit, security, AML, Risk Office, Corporate Center, Accounting, Management information systems, Investors Relations and Legal Office.

During 2002 and 2003 was Member of the Board of Directors and Chairman of the Audit Committee of Eureko B.V., Amsterdam. In 2007 was appointed member of the Supervisory Board of the Euronext, NV, the European holding of NYSE Euronext, position held until the end of 2009.

elements.summary:
You know that person on the team who is constantly leading projects, wearing all the hats, taking initiative, and getting things done? 

*raises hand* Hi, hello, that's me!

With 13+ years of supporting high net worth individuals, I operate as a highly trusted facilitator for growth and optimization. I specialize in project management, operations (executive support and business), high level event production, digital marketing, and luxury travel coordination. Known for having a keen eye for detail, high integrity, creative solutions, and an uncanny ability to anticipate needs.

A results orientated leader with experience in private equity, publicly listed and privately owned companies across a range of sectors. 

I am currently Chief Financial Officer of Boston MFO, a multinational corporate services provider. 

Key career achievements:
- Multiple transformation projects
- Shared service centre implementation 
- Built many high performing finance teams 
- Global banking consolidation into a single platform 
- Oracle ERP implementation 
- Numerous acquisition implementations 
- KPI and financial reporting development 
- Rationalization of cost base
- Major improvements to working capital and cash
- Operational leadership of sub businesses collectively generating revenues of €30m

message.text: Message your 1st degree connection, Matthew, for a warm introduction to Louise.

elements.summary:
I was the Managing Director of Sutton Place (UK) Limited for 17 years.  Sutton Place is a complex international single family office across 3 locations for a group of internationally mobile high net worth clients covering many generations.  I was instrumental in establishing the London office and thereafter covered the London COO role, acted as Head of Family Advisory Services and Tax Director across multiple tax disciplines and territories.  I also served on the global executive management committee governing the overall strategic vision of the family, managing fiduciary obligations and focussing on the multi-generational preservation of wealth.  I have also served on a number of boards of operating businesses, investment entities, philanthropic foundations and acted as owners' representative across various non-financial asset classes such as yachts, aviation, art and collections.

The role required the building of strong long term trusted relationships with multiple family members across the world, understanding their passion and intended legacy, whilst building successful family dynamics.  Focus was on guiding family to deploy wealth in responsible creative ways whilst safeguarding it for future generations through sound wealth management.  

As Co-Founder of ADIRA, my focus was to utilise my SFO experience, in advising other families, together with their related stakeholders and professional advisers, to develop their strategic plans, provide for generational change and any intended legacy, whilst also ensuring their overall financial and investment affairs were fully provided for, with appropriate governance and oversight in place.  This experience led me to advising families on how their own SFO should be structured and made appropriate for their unique needs.

I now act as the head of a new private family office operating from London and across various European jurisdictions.    As Financial Chief of Staff, my role is to advise on all matters relating to financial and wealth management, coordinate business and investment opportunities, and ensure the family office provides appropriate professional services across a range of private and business spheres.

currentPositions.description:
PeakView Private Investment Office was established with the sole objective of assisting wealthier individuals and families to manage their investment assets with a level of sophistication that is more appropriate for their greater level of wealth. We take an institutional approach and seek investment opportunities across the entire spectrum of global public markets, private market investments and specialised direct private capital transactions – allowing our clients to access sophisticated investments far beyond what most mainstream private banks can offer.

In order to achieve this, we partner with only a select number of private individuals and families so that we can provide the level of time and dedication required to manage sizeable, and often complex, investment portfolios.

elements.summary:
Please note that I cannot accept any more invitations to connect as I have exceeded the LinkedIn connections limit (30,000).  Please do, however, feel free to follow me and to reach out to me via e-mail:

schishty@outlook.com

C-Suite, venture capital, private equity, strategic, financial and investment banking advisory professional as well as investor and business owner / entrepreneur with over 30 years of experience in startups, fundraising, strategic planning, business management, business development, corporate development, M&A, corporate finance, capital markets, financial markets and treasury.  Experience with both for-profit and not-for-profit organisations.

Network:
Senior level contacts including with investors (angel investors / networks, (U)HNWI, family offices, venture capital, private equity as well as fund of funds and sovereign wealth funds / DFIs), incubators / accelerators, corporations, management teams and governmental organisations globally.

Current focus:
Startup / early round ventures (including AgTech, AI/ML, AR/VR, Blockchain, CleanTech, EdTech, Enterprise PaaS / SaaS, FinTech, IoT, BioTech, HealthTech, MedTech, RetailTech, Robotics, etc) as well as global impact / sustainability / agricultural projects.

Expertise:
Mentoring, Business Development, Corporate Development, Fundraising, International Growth & Scaling, Investor Relations, Strategic Advisory, Mergers & Acquisitions / Exits, Principal Finance, Corporate Finance (Equity, Equity Linked, Mezzanine, High Yield, Securitisation, Bonds, Notes, MTN & CP Programmes, Senior Debt), Deal Structuring, Treasury Management, Capital Market Issuance and Investment, Contract Negotiation and Business Management / Restructuring.

pastPositions.title: Chief Investment Officer

currentPositions.description:
More about Fahr LLC:

Fahr LLC acts as the “umbrella” entity to manage and support a variety of entities and efforts related to climate change, advanced energy, sustainable food systems, consumer financial protections, regenerative agriculture, and socially responsible finance. The entities and efforts include NextGen Climate’s political and policy groups, various philanthropic funds, The Ranch, The Family Office’s operational and investment activities, The Office of Kat Taylor, and other affiliated entities and projects.

Fahr LLC is the nexus between a handful of exciting and powerful efforts aimed to achieve systems change and maximum collective impact. The Principals are active in a variety of social enterprises, public benefit and philanthropic ventures. Fahr LLC employees are from diverse backgrounds who are united around shared values about our future and a core belief that we have the power to change the course of history.

Office of Kat Taylor: www.kattaylor.com
Beneficial State Bank: www.beneficialstatebank.com
Beneficial State Foundation: www.beneficialstate.org
TomKat Ranch & TomKat Ranch Educational Foundation: www.tomkatranch.org
Radicle Impact: www.radicleimpact.com 
Fahr LLC: www.linkedin.com/company/fahr-llc/

elements.summary:
WHO I AM:
•  Dynamic, results-oriented, public policy professional with 18 years of legislative advocacy, analysis and research experience, superior leadership abilities, and adept project management skills   
•  Background and demonstrated success crafting and advancing the vision and policy agenda of high-profile executives, State and Local elected leaders, agencies, and organizations
•  Exceptional relationship management with diverse set of private, public, and nonprofit sector stakeholders 
•  Well-positioned to leverage an extensive professional network across five Bay Area counties and Southern California---Santa Clara, San Mateo, San Francisco, Marin, Alameda, Los Angeles, and Sacramento Counties 
•  Expertise and programmatic experience with issues related to philanthropy, housing, transportation, land use, economic development, health care, consumer protections, public safety, food and agriculture systems change, and corporate responsibility
•  A tenacious leader with strong political and business acumen, personnel management expertise, agile interpersonal skills, and proven strategic and informed decision-making abilities to enhance an institution’s efficacy, productivity, and influence

CURRENT RESPONSIBILITIES:
•  Policy Development and Implementation
•  Operations
•  Project Management
•  Political Strategy
•  Thought Leadership
•  Intergovernmental Affairs
•  Policy Analysis and Research
•  Talent Recruitment and Personnel Mentorship
•  Communications/Community Affairs
•  Stakeholder Engagement/Outreach
•  Operations Process Improvements
•  Performance Metrics for Programs and Projects

FOCUS AREAS/INTERESTS: 
•  Philanthropic Reform
•  Banking and Consumer Protections
•  Economic and Community Development
•  Food Systems Change and Agriculture
•  Transportation
•  Land Use
•  Housing

currentPositions.description:
Crispin joined Ironbridge as Managing Partner and Chief of Staff in 2010.  Ironbridge operate as a Multi-Family Office with a primary focus on private company investment on behalf of its UHNW family investors (venture growth investing) and  M&A/fundraising advisory services.

As a Family Office investing in growth stage companies and property developments recent Ironbridge investments include: £10m GDV Highgate Residential Development, Richmond Pictures Debt fund, The Fine Art Society Syndicate, Hexigone, Plotbox, Fresh Valeting, Haygain, CPG Ltd, Censo, RT Automotive, Edwards Engineering, Contact Engine, Shopwave, ICS,  YuuZoo, Magic Light Ltd and The Arts Club (Dover St, London).
currentPositions.title: Chief of Staff, Family Office

message.text: Message your 1st degree connection, Simon, for a warm introduction to Crispin.

elements.summary:
I am currently Chief of Staff at the Multi Family Office, Ironbridge Capital Partners, and am an experienced PE/Debt investor and adviser across technology, property, media, the arts and film/TV. With an unusual combination of legal & finance qualifications and experience, coupled with exceptional operating experience, I have an entrepreneurial outlook and thrive on delivering projects and interesting investments on behalf of our UHNW partners and families.

Originally qualifying as a lawyer I transitioned to Investment Banking in M&A before moving in-house to BBC Worldwide corporate finance and then on to Microsoft founder Paul G Allen's Single Family Office (Vulcan.com) as Investment and Commercial Director.  With over US$20bn AUM I was a Director of Vulcan European Media Investments an active PE investor, and also a Director of The Hospital Group, a high profile US$100m members club and media facility in the heart of Covent Garden. 

I have managed the financing, design, planning and construction of over 20 property investment projects across prime London and Oxfordshire - with individual budgets and GDV’s of upto £10m (including managing all operational matters including budgeting, health and safety, insurance, finance, planning etc.).  I currently also manage all aspects of a multi million pound property rental portfolio in Oxfordshire and London, including maintenance, licensing, planning, financing and accounting.
